hero.intro: I‚Äôm Gibran ‚Äî a Senior Product Manager @ Yourpay, balancing user rants, business wants, designer slants, and developer grunts, and merging it all into production (usually on Fridays). I‚Äôve spent over 4 years with Figma, Jira, and VS Code open on my never-shut-down Mac. When I‚Äôm not optimizing funnels, I‚Äôm optimizing my deadlift or flight itinerary.
